synopsis.text:
Will ing to trade his own fortunes for a chance to see her smile, Shinichirou finds himself in a peculiar predicament. As a high school student with dreams of becoming a picture book author, he shares his home with Hiromi, a classmate who hides her sorrow behind a veil of melancholy after the loss of her father. Unable to find the words to comfort her, Shinichirou's life takes an unexpected turn when he encounters Noe, an enigmatic girl who has claimed him as her pet chicken.

Noe, burdened by her own emotional turmoil, is on a quest to reclaim her lost tears. As Shinichirou navigates the complexities of his relationships with these two girls, he must also confront the challenges posed by his childhood friend, Andou Aiko, and the traditional Japanese dance his family insists he practices.

In this bittersweet tale of love, loss, and self-discovery, Shinichirou embarks on a journey to help Hiromi and Noe overcome their sorrows, all while striving to complete his picture book. As he delves deeper into their lives, he realizes that the key to healing their hearts may also unlock his own.
